name: GetLastPromoteAliasesStatus
description:
Retrieve aliases and their mapping status from last promote request.

Call this tool to obtain a list of aliases related to the most recent promote request, along with their current mapping status for a specified project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Specify the Project ID to filter the promote aliases related to that specific project.

parameters.name: max_aliases_to_list
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of aliases to list from the request. The maximum allowed is 100.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of aliases to list from a request (max 100).

parameters.name: get_aliases_created_after_epoch
parameters.description: Get aliases created after the specified epoch timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get aliases created after this epoch timestamp.

parameters.name: aliases_created_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Get aliases created before this epoch timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get aliases created before this epoch timestamp.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of. Must be a string.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug representing the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: filter_failed_aliases
parameters.description: Set to true to filter results to only include aliases that failed to map to the requested deployment.

value_schema.description: Filter results down to aliases that failed to map to the requested deployment

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of aliases to list from a request (max 100).

value_schema.description: Maximum number of aliases to list from a request (max 100).

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Get aliases created after this epoch timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get aliases created after this epoch timestamp.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Get aliases created before this epoch timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get aliases created before this epoch timestamp.

parameters.name: failedOnly
parameters.description: Filter results down to aliases that failed to map to the requested deployment

value_schema.description: Filter results down to aliases that failed to map to the requested deployment

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.
